wikimedia-copyrightwarning:
Ka e naŋ wa a leuhibu ŋa biŋ soŋ, be la wuloŋ ka e sagɛɛ a [https://foundation.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Policy:Terms_of_Use Terms of Use], ane e la sagɛɛ sagebu meŋa ka e na bahɛɛ e tuma ko [https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/ CC BY-SA 4.0 License] ane a [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Text_of_the_GNU_Free_Documentation_License GFDL].
E sagɛɛ ka a hyperlink bii URL eɛ ko a yɛlɛ maalebu goɔloŋ.

* O baaroo la $5
